title: Study shows success of measles vaccine campaigns in India

title_detail.value: Study shows success of measles vaccine campaigns in India

summary: A mass measles vaccination campaign saved tens of thousands of children's lives in India between 2010 and 2013, according to a new report.

summary_detail.value: A mass measles vaccination campaign saved tens of thousands of children's lives in India between 2010 and 2013, according to a new report.
